H0.text: What was the Plowden Report concerned with. Urban Planning and Development

H1.text: What was the Plowden Report concerned with. Environmental Conservation

H2.text: What was the Plowden Report concerned with. Economic Policy and Trade

H3.text: What was the Plowden Report concerned with. Children and their primary school education

A4.text: The Plowden Report is the unofficial name for the 1967 report of the Central Advisory Council For Education (England) into primary education in England.

A5.text: The report, entitled Children and their Primary Schools, reviewed primary education in a wholesale fashion.
